name: Encyclopedia Explosica
description:
WARNING: Early Alpha

There be bugs in these waters.

Explode your friends through brain power!

Well...brain power used to answer questions, that's channeled into actions, that you can then spend with your ships and cannons, and...Look. It still counts. 

Sail around, aim around, shoot around, and may the smartest (or the luckiest) person win.

Here's why the game exists in the first place.

 

Features
  • Multiplayer goodness - get together with your best friend(s) and sink your lesser acquaintances!
  • Ship sailing and cannon fighting on the high sea(s)! 
  • Physics based movement! Your smart friends can't aim to save their lives? Smash your way through your opponents (beware of them smashing through you as well)!
  • Answer questions based on real-world topics / subjects! Ravaging the seven seas is all good, but let's be smart about it...
  • Dedicated server - you can always hop-in with your friends, no matter the time of day. 
(Very) Early Access

Encyclopedia Explosica is in a prototype phase! Placeholders are abundant, crashes can and will probably happen and there's only this much content, so far.

Expect levels, features, and mechanics to change between versions. 

Besides bugs a plenty, this gives you the opportunity to shape the future of the game. Make your voice heard with suggestions, comments and feedback, then boast to your friends that you're a part-time Game Designer when your suggestion makes it to release! How to do that? Boy do you have options:

  • Pop in the Discord channel!
  • Submit your impressions in the survey🗒️!
  • Leave a comment on the page!
How to play?

Asking about the files you downloaded? Simply unzip and run Explosica.exe (and enjoy).

Asking about the in-game controls? Give this a read.
